description.value:
The zombie carries a plague that can create more of its own kind.

This functions as the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.Actor.Plague Zombie]{Plague Zombie's} zombie rot, except at stage 5, the victim rises as another of the zombie's type, rather than a plague zombie.

Zombie Rot

An infected creature can't heal damage it takes from zombie rot until it has been cured of the disease.

Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:|name:Zombie Rot]

Stage 1 carrier with no ill effect (1 day)

Stage 2 @Damage[1d6[void]] damage (1 day)

Stage 3 @Damage[1d6[void]] damage (1 day)

Stage 4 @Damage[1d6[void]] damage (1 day)

Stage 5 dead, rising as another of the zombie's type immediately
